training.title: Anticipation
training.subtitle: Anticipating future events increases feelings of happiness
questions: What is one event in the future that you are looking forward to? (it can be anything ranging from a good meal you will have to a vacation)
What specifically about that event are you looking forward to?

training.title: Gratitude
training.subtitle: Regular appreciation brings you in touch with positive feelings

multipart.question: What are three things that you are grateful for?

training.title: Appreciation For Others
training.subtitle: Appreciating people in your life deepens relationships and well-being
questions: Name one person that you are grateful towards
Why are you grateful towards this individual?
What can you do to show them you are grateful?

training.title: Accomplishments
training.subtitle: Remembering and basking in your accomplishments help build self-esteem
questions: What is an accomplishment that you’ve made recently that you are proud of
What makes you proud about it?

training.title: Enjoy The Moment
training.subtitle: Taking time to enjoy the moment is crucial for happiness
questions: Take 10 slow and deep breaths. Are you feeling calmer?
Take a scan of your surroundings. What pleasant things come to mind? (If you’d like, you can substitute surroundings with your favourite place)

training.title: Express Gratitude
training.subtitle: Appreciating other people is one of the best ways to increase contentment
questions: Who is one person that you are grateful towards?
What would you say to them?

training.title: 3 Good Things
training.subtitle: Learning to see the good things in your life contributes strongly to happiness

multipart.question: What are 3 Good things that have happened to you recently?

training.title: Compassion
training.subtitle: Thinking compassionately about others has been shown to help people feel happier
questions: Think of your loved ones. Now write 3 blessings to them (e.g. I wish you happiness, I wish you love, I wish you joy)
Now think of some people who are your acquaintances. Now write 3 blessings to them.
Finally, think of some people who you currently hold a grudge against. Now write 3 blessings to them.
